title: Development of Hypercontent-Based Character Education Learning Materials: Practical Course for Science Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic character education concepts and practical experience in science fields
context.additional_context: Strengthening character education through hypercontent-based learning materials in a smartphone-centric limited technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain core values of character education (responsibility, respect, fairness, etc.) by connecting them to scientific case analyses
Learners accurately apply dilemma resolution strategies in real work situations at 80% or higher using interactive elements in hypercontent
Learners create a character education implementation plan through peer assessment and incorporate improvement feedback three or more times

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
